p.d: The family already has enough to cope with, so Julien and Marie decide to keep quiet about their separation. Not letting the cat out of the bag is easier said than done when living under the same roof! Directed by: Stephen Cafiero (season 3, France, 2019) Screenplay: Frédéric Rosset, Camille Rosset Cast: Sébastien Chassagne (Julien), Marie Kauffmann (Marie), Théo Fernandez (Jacques), Nathalie Cerda (Sylvie), Matilda Marty (Emma), Allison Chassagne (Julie), Charlie Nelson (Louis), Amel Charif (Sam), Julie Farenc-Deramond (Léa), Martin Judas (Dylan), Bruni Makaya (Yanis) Genre: comedy drama
